= Circuit =

XMC1100 board already has the serial monitor port connected to the JTAG head. Simply connect a terminal software (e.g. TestTerm) on the respective COM port.

== SETUP ==

 # Connect the XMC1100 Boot Kit to your PC. Windows will install the necessary driver if it's connected the first time.
 # Find XMC1100 virtual COM port via Control Panel->System->Device Manager->Ports->Jlink CDC UART Port (COMxx).
 # Start Hyper Terminal on PC with the settings shown in http://arduino-to-xmc.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/TerminalSettings.jpg.
